hadiths.text: Narrated Anas bin Malik:offered four rak`at of Zuhr prayer with the Prophet (p.b.u.h) at Medina and two rak`at at Dhul-Hulaifa. (i.e. shortened the `Asr prayer)

chapter.ara-name: باب يَقْصُرُ إِذَا خَرَجَ مِنْ مَوْضِعِهِ
chapter.eng-name: When a traveller leaves his original place, he can shorten his Salat (prayer)
